long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Introduction

Poshmark Assistant is a potent tool designed to streamline operations by automating repetitive tasks, optimizing your listings, and elevating customer interactions.

# Key Features
Poshmark Assistant offers a range of valuable features, including:

Scheduled closet sharing with your followers.
Scheduled closet sharing during Posh Parties.
Automated following of sellers' followers.
Automated following of sellers you're interested in.
Scheduled unfollowing of your followers.
Unfollowing of the users you are currently following.
Comprehensive daily statistics display.

# Is it Free?
Yes, Poshmark Assistant is available for free, offering fundamental functionalities. Users also have the option to upgrade for access to enhanced features.

# Data Confidentiality
Rest assured, all data processing occurs exclusively on your local computer. Our web servers are not involved, guaranteeing the utmost privacy and confidentiality regarding your information.

If you have any inquiries or require assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us via email at poshmark.assistant.com@gmail.com or through our website directly using the following link: https://poshmark-assistant.com/contact

IMPORTANT NOTICE:
It is important to note that Poshmark Assistant operates independently and is not affiliated with the official Poshmark platform. This application is an unofficial, standalone development. For further details on our privacy policies, please visit: Privacy Policy
